Dataset Name: Increased intra-tumoral glucose level is associated with enhanced chemotherapeutic response in pancreatic cancer
Dataset Description: Pancreatic tumors are refractory to current chemotherapies, and there are no effective alternative therapies available for patients with pancreatic cancer (PC). We present an innovative approach to improve chemotherapy efficacy in preclinical models of pancreatic cancer. The effectiveness of various chemotherapies, including standard of care FOLFIRINOX, was remarkably enhanced by inducing a state (Read more on Pubmed)
Dataset Design: Orthotopic tumors under hyperglycemic (D30) compared to normoglycemic condition. Five independent biological replicates were used.
Dataset Assay: Cell Culture, CRISPR, RT-qPCR, RNA Sequencing, Immunohistochemistry Staining Method
